column1: Abdulino (Russian: Абду́лино) is a town in Orenburg Oblast
Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Abdulino serves as the administrative center of Abdulinsky District
column3: even though it is not a part of it. As an administrative division
column4: it is incorporated separately as the Town of Abdulino—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column5: the territories of the Town of Abdulino and of Abdulinsky District are incorporated as Abdulinsky Urban Okrug.
